* Add emeril to project. ([@fnichol][])


## 0.2.2 (September 25, 2011)

## Bug fixes

* In data\_bag recipe, apps attr gets set rather than appended to. ([@fnichol][])

* Add installation instructions to README. ([@fnichol][])


## 0.2.0 (August 13, 2011)

The initial release.
